name: Tower!2011:SE
description: Tower!2011:SE is not an arcade game. With a complex command structure, advanced AI and Speech Recognition technology Tower!2011:SE will allow you to experience of the thrill of being a real air traffic controller.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB dedicated video card Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: sound card is required for voice and speech
recommended_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows  7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB dedicated video card Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: sound card is required for voice and speech
